Entries.282815601/f Clint 2000/t 900 1700: continue/7 13/farmer 5 18 0 Clint 3 13 2 Emily 5 15 0/skippable/move Emily 0 -2 3/speak Emily "Hey, Clint! I found this cool geode up in the mountains the other day.#$b#Think you could break it open for me? I'm dying to know what's inside!$h"/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Oh, uh... sure thing, Emily. Of course."/move Clint 0 -1 1/move Clint 5 0 2/faceDirection Emily 1/move Clint 0 1 1/move Clint 3 0 1/pause 1000/speak Clint "It's an aquamarine."/move Emily 5 0 1/speak Emily "Wow! It's gorgeous!"/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "Uh, yep!... It's a beauty alright...$s"/pause 100/speak Emily "How much do I owe you, hmm? 25G?$h"/speak Clint "Uh... don't worry about it, okay? It's on the house.$4"/speak Emily "Really?! Oh, Clint! You're the best friend a girl could ask for!$h"/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Oh... n-no, not at all. Don't worry about it.$8#$b#Anything for a... friend.$s"/speak Emily "Yay! I've got to go show this to Haley. She'll love it!$h#$b#See you later, Clint! Stop by the saloon tonight and say hello!"/faceDirection Clint 2/move Emily -5 0 2/move Emily 0 4 2/speak Emily "Oh! @! Nice to see you!$h#$b#Came to pay Clint a visit, huh?"/speak Clint "Oh... hi, @.$s"/faceDirection Emily 0/move Clint -3 0 0/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -5 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/pause 100/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Emily "I'm heading out. See both of you later!$h"/move farmer 1 0 3/move Emily 0 2 2/warp Emily -100 -100/pause 100/speak Clint "Uh... sorry about that, @.$s"/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/speak Clint "$q -1 null#What can I do for you?$s#$r -1 0 event_blacksmith1#I have a geode.#$r -1 0 event_blacksmith2#I'm here about a tool upgrade.#$r -1 0 event_blacksmith3#I came to see you."/pause 100/speak Clint "Sorry about the wait. A-and earlier, too. With Emily."/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "It's hard to turn down a friend, you know?$s"/question fork1 "#Yep.#I'm sorry."/fork sadClint/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "Anyways... back to business.$s"/friendship Clint -100/end
Entries.sadClint: pause 300/speak Clint "Don't apologize, @... There's nothing to be sorry for.#$b#I'm just a friend to her. She doesn't see me as anything else.$s"/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 100/speak Clint "$q -1 null#I know I have to accept it, but... it's tough.$s#$r -1 0 event_sadclint1#I'm here for you if you need me.#$r -1 0 event_sadclint2#I know the feeling."/pause 100/speak Clint "I'm glad you're here, @. With a friend like you, who needs romance, anyways?$h#$b#Uh, I mean...$8"/end dialogue Clint "...Never mind. That was dumb.$8"
Entries.282815603/e 282815602/f Clint 2500/t 900: continue/7 13/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 3 13 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 3/move farmer -2 0 0/speak Clint "O-oh, @. You came.$4"/move Clint 0 -1 1/move Clint 5 0 2/move Clint 0 3 1/move Clint 4 0 1/pause 1000/move farmer 6 0 1/pause 1000/speak Clint "I, uh... I told you I-I have something for you, right?$8"/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "W-well, um... I actually have two things for you."/move Clint -2 0 3/pause 1500/speak Clint "@... I-I, uh... I made this for you. I-It's a ring."/message "Clint gives you a beautiful silver band."/pause 1200/speak Clint "I-I know it's not much, but... I really hope you like it.$4"/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "@, I know this is probably gonna gross you out, but...$8#$b#I've never felt this way about someone before. Not even Emily.$8#$b#I-I-I think I-I'm... in love with you, @.$8"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I feel the same way.#I'm sorry... I don't feel the same."/fork rejectClint/pause 300/speak Clint "R-really?! You... You feel the same?$4#$b#I-it's weird... It's like I didn't even notice it was happening... b-but... here I am.$4"/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "O-oh, uh... about your second gift...$4"/showFrame Clint 42/pause 1500/showFrame Clint 12/pause 500/speak Clint "I-I hope that was okay.$4"/pause 300/speak Clint "You're the greatest, @. I'm so glad that I met you.$h"/pause 1000/end dialogue Clint "I'm so happy you feel the same. This is the happiest I've ever felt.$4"
Entries.rejectClint: pause 500/speak Clint "...O-oh. Um.$8#$b#I-I'm sorry, @. I... I thought...$8#$b#Never mind...$8"/pause 300/speak Clint "Um... forget I said anything... please?$s#$b#You... you can keep the ring.$s"/move Clint 0 -2 3/move Clint -5 0 0/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -2 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/pause 500/friendship Clint -500/end dialogue Clint "Um... sorry, @. I-I'd like to be alone a while...$s"
